description:
A trail runner’s top created for cool comfort, freedom of movement, and softness next-to-skin – then diligently designed to shed every possible gram – the Incendo frees you to travel faster and farther. The stretch Airshell double-weave nylon feels almost weightless, has a DWR finish for water repellency, and allows an exceptionally high level of airflow. The fitted hood extends protection, Permair® panels under the arms and on the back further elevate ventilation, and the whole jacket stows into its own pocket – pack it for all your runs.

Updated with a revised fit.
name: Arcteryx Incendo Airshell Hoody - Mens
